public ref class Model3D abstract : System::Windows::Media::Animation::Animatable, IFormattable
type Model3D = class inherit Animatable interface IFormattable interface DUCE.IResource

remarks.format:
## Remarks Objects of this type include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Light>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> class to render <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects. You can compose <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup> to form a single model. You can share <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects among <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> objects to make multiple instances in a scene.
## Examples [!code-xaml[animate3drotation#Animate3DRotation3DN3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Animate3DRotation/CS/Window1.xaml#animate3drotation3dn3)]

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , and makes deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object. For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied; however, their current values are copied.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .
